title: SOLD FS SGC Graded T206 Bergen (catching) Sweet Caporal
author: Futbowl

posts.post_title: SOLD FS SGC Graded T206 Bergen (catching) Sweet Caporal
posts.post_content:
I am liquidating some of my oddball items that don’t fit my collection which is mostly 1950’s-1970’s. This is the only T206 in my collection. I’ve tried to price it based upon what I could locate online. If I am way off, my apologies. SOLD shipped (USPS First Class) payment via PP/FF. Hopefully someone here will appreciate this one more than I do. Sorry for the flash in the pics, if you need more pics or better pics please message me. Thanks.

Rob
